name: BUBBLE BOY (NEKORUMA)
description:
i made this little tamagochi simulator for ludum dare 46: theme "keep it alive".

It is my first finished project, when reading the topic of the ludum dare I thought about the tamagotchis that I played as a child in the 90s.

I was also inspired by the Nintendo game & watch, obvious by its design :D

I have done it with Construct 2, the graphics are made with Photoshop and Aseprite.
For sounds use SFXR, GSCC and Melody Raiser.

Although it is a small and simple game, I hope you like it! :D
